description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Irving, United States. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Contemporary Dallas Retreat near Lake Carolyn with Three Onsite Restaurants, Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Experience the epitome of city solace and Texan hospitality in this urban oasis, perched on the shores of Lake Carolyn in Irving, just 15 minutes from the city of Dallas. From iconic cowboy culture to mouth-watering Tex-Mex cuisine, find it all and then some at this sophisticated hotel, boasting well-appointed rooms and suites to relax and unwind in. Take a dip in the resort-style pool overlooking the lake, lounge in a cabana with a book or head to the Mokara Salon & Spa for some much-needed pampering. When hunger pangs beckon, you can go to the LRH Restaurant & Bar for some regional fare and sip on well-crafted cocktails at The Lakehouse Waterfront Lounge.

seo.title: Hoteles en Irving - Estados Unidos Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Irving, United States con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
